messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
You look like you might just have
the Pokémon I’ve been looking for!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
You didn’t have a single Pokémon
I wanted... You’re no Collector!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
I’m very picky, so I want to collect
every Pokémon without anyone’s help....I do have friends, though.
No, seriously! I do!
